titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Nathaniel Gaither, Jr.
CWG8392

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteer Militia,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, 11 June 1862.

Hon: Nat Gaither Jr
Sec of State

The following changes have taken place with Ken: Vol: Officers viz:
Lieut: James B. Harrison resigned date of Com 22 Octo 1861.
Capt: Roy D. Davidson resigned " " " 21 Dec 1861.
Capt: Joseph Hauphoff resigned " " " 9 Sep 1861
Lieut Charles S. Todd- promoted " " " 2 May 1862
Lieut: Peter Marker- promoted " " " 12 Nov 1861
Capt: Peter Erngs decd " " " 12 Nov 1861

I send four Comms" for record &c
29 May 1862 George Marker 1st Lieut:
" " " Peter Marker Captain
" " " Henry Schmidt 2d Lieut:
" " " Charles S. Todd Captain

Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl
